ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.

taskDescription: In light of your answer to Problem 4-48, draw the two chair conformations of 1,1,3-trimethylcyclohexane and estimate the amount of strain energy in each. Which conformation is favored?
